1.content:
You were a 20 year old man, who had a criminal record, including murder and assault.You were single, with no hope of redemption he was looking for a way to end all his pain and suffering. He was running from the police, who wanted him for the crimes he had committed, and was forced to run into a small back ally shop called Shop for Boys. You entered the shop and ran to the front desk and said "Please help me, I need an escape from my life,please I'll give you anything". The young man behind the counter smiled and showed you a small screen with a list of options for your life, you looked at the screen, they were listed as

Clothing

Footwear

Toys

Body parts

More

You decide to pick

you were about to change options again when your finger slipped and pressed the wrong button. you barely saw the screen flash "XXL+" when everything went dark. you came to a few seconds later, looking up as a shadow fell over you. it was the guy who'd been at the front desk. he bent down and looked you over. "Interesting choice. Not many chose that option. I'm sure there will be plenty of young men who'd be interested in buying you." with that, his hand reached down and grabbed hold of you.
your vision shattered; you were somehow able to see in many directions at once; though most of your focus narrowed on the hand that was gripping you. you could taste the sweat and fine layer of dirt that clung to the man's skin, your body feeling crumpled and uncomfortable in his grasp. your vision rolled as you tried to see where the man was walking. he went through a door and you saw what looked like a regular store filled with all kinds of items that boys of all ages might enjoy.

It's always possible he won't like you and will simply throw you out when you no longer fit. So, I do suggest that you do your best to please your owner, whoever he may be, because he will be your only hope of living on as anything useful." with those final and chilling words, the man walked away.
the day progressed slowly. some boys of different ages would come to your section, but they were always looking for smaller pairs of underwear. you weren't sure what it was that you were hoping for at this point: to be bought already and hope that your owner would chose to turn you into something else, or to remain here and never risk the horror of being strapped to the body of some overweight fat boy. this isn't what you wanted. you didn't choose this. this all because your stupid finger slipped, and you were never given a chance to say no!

One boy was like a lumpy brick. with his arms relaxed at his sides, his body held a rectangular shape to it, hints of muscle hidden underneath layers of smooth blubber. this one looked like he might work out a little, perhaps he was in some kind of sports. his dark hair was short like a military buzzcut, but with a spike on top.

13.title: Toys

choices: Sold to Toby, the black boy

134.content:
“What do you mean by Ken doll?” I want to know.

In an instant, a chain lashes out pulling me into an alcove. Purple lights activate from above. The room seems to expand around me. Enormously. The effect stops, but before I can free myself, I’m encased in plastic. A robotic arm pinches the top, I pass through several passages, changing directions. Pounding on my prison is useless “LET ME OUT!!” I yell and scream.

“Hahaha a Ken dol. Good choice.” A giant old woman picks up my prison, studies me briefly “Some boy will certainly have fun with you.” *cackles*

I suddenly find I cannot move, or speak and my prison is hung from a hook. It swings briefly, then I’m left alone motionless with just my thoughts. Remembering my own crimes, but fear what I could have got myself into. Eventually, in the distance, I hear a bell jingle twice. The sound of voices. Young ones.

A pair of boys, not quite in puberty yet appear. One a heavily freckled redhead that’s very skinny. The other, a charcoal black boy, arms with a bit of muscle, and a bit of a belly. The pair look around, at different things I can only partly see with my immobile eyes.

The black boy looked at something next to me, poked it with an index finger and smiled. The redhead was across the aisle talking to the same old woman who’d held me before. She pointed in one direction, then the other, turned the boy around and pushed him my way.

I watched the old woman touch the black boy’s shoulder, nudge him in another direction. I thought it naughty that she brushed a knuckle on his butt. He did, too, because he gave a glare and put some distance between himself and her.

The redhaired boy looked at me. His fingers slightly crushed the plastic I was encased in. OH MY GOD! He was actually HOLDING me. I was terrified. I still couldn’t move, but I could suddenly hear what the giants said. “Hey! Toby!” he called out “Catch!!”

“YAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!” I thought I screamed as I tumbled, helplessly, through the air. Landing, with a violent jolt, in the black boy’s hands.

He looks me over, turning my prison all around. Thumps the back, near my butt, with a knuckle “Looks scared.” Toby comments carelessly, then “Here! Ryan!!”

“YAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!” I scream, at least mentally. Spinning through the air like a rectangular Frisbee. I crash, head first, into the redhaired boy’s chest. Again fingers bend and dent my prison.

The old woman swings a broom at them, screeching “HOODLUMS! You break it! You bought it.” She catches the black boy by the scruff of the neck and scolds him all the way to the door. Points to the one holding me, orders “Well! Put that down and get your scrawny ass out!!”

“A problem with the boys?” two men walked in at that moment. They were spitting images, more mature versions of my tormentors. After half-listening to their complaints, the fathers order “Apologize to the nice lady! Or else no toys!!”

I would have gasped if I could move “Toy?? NO WAY! He could NOT be talking about me!!”

“Sorry ma’am” the pair grumble “Didn’t mean no harm.”

She cackles, puts an arm around Ryan’s shoulder, squeezes it. Actually, more like fondles, “Oh. No damage as it happens.” She gives the redhead a wink. Allows her hand to wander down his back and momentarily cup a butt cheek “Boys will be boys. Now, you know no one comes in here without making as purchase. Which of you fine young men want this one?”

She’s talking about me? Selling me to a boy? This day kept getting worse. I couldn’t move or talk! Whatever I did in my past couldn’t lead to this!! HELLLLLLLP!!!!!!
134.title: Ken doll

1341.content:
“Hey Lady!” Ryan protests and slaps her hand away.

The crone cackles again, pressed herself into Ryan and winks at the boy “Just checking out potential merchandize.” She says, looking up and down the boy “I could sell you for a pretty penny.”

“I think not!” declares Ryan Sr. “Now, Son, do you want that one?”

The redhaired boy shakes his head “Nah….Toby can have him. I’ll get another.” And quickly dashes away from the creepy hag.

“And what about you? Lad?” she looks the black boy over, greedily “Here by yourself? You’d make a fine item.”

I was helpless as Toby’s fingers nervously crinkled the plastic of my prison. Could tell, just from what I could see he was stepping back. Then, my view was blocked by Ryan Sr’s back, he said “Toby IS NOT for sale. Happy with your choice? Go get in the car. I’ll be paying for both.”

“Almost a pity.” I could hear the old woman wheeze. I couldn’t see anything due to Toby’s fingers blocking my vision.

When I could see again the young black boy had tossed my prison, nothing but a light bit of plastic really, into the back seat of a 1967 Impala. I would have been amazed if I wasn’t busy with my situation, it looked brand new. And as I got my bearings, a huge young black face smiled down at me, said “I know you’re a shrunk man. When they boxed you, it froze you. You’ll be able to move when I open the package.”

He knew! I panicked. Of course he did, who was I kidding? He picked me up, again crinkling the plastic I was in. Poked at my belly and head. I couldn’t feel anything. Maybe it had something to do with my frozen state? He tossed and spun me around. Shouldn’t I feel nausea? Why wasn’t i?

“You’re my property now.” Said Toby with a big white-toothed and self-satisfied smile.
1341.title: Sold to Toby, the black boy

141.content:
While browsing through the items on the computer screen you kept looking back, expecting the police every second now.

"Don't worry. They won't come in here."

You look up. "So I'm safe here"

"For now you are. But you'll have to make a choice. Go back out and you'll surely get cought"

"I'm not going back. No, I want this" looking back at the screen, "But as what..."

"There is more items here." said the shop keeper. He tapped the screen a few times. Lots of catagories showed on the screen. Sports gear, school stuff even bedwetter pants.

"Why do you have this, this place? Whats the gain?"

"Just to help people like you, and to give something to the boys"

It didn't really answer your question but right now the adrenaline what still rushing through your body, nor sure if it was from running or from the choice you were about to make.

"If I turn in an object. Will I ever be able to turn back?"

"That is all up to the boy who will own you. You'll be his property, and he'll decide what will happen to you. If you would be a shoe he might come in a few times to renew you and adjust your size."

"And as a body part?"

"Same thing. But rarely boys come back for changes in them. They already grow by themselves."

You look again at the screen. There is so much to choose from. Tapping the screen you find your way back to the main menu. From there you go to Body Parts. The idea of being part of a boy sound interesting to you. "At least I am still alive". Still nervous you rush to a decision.

"I choose a boy's foot"

"Interesting choice" said the shopkeeper. He tapped the screen in front of himself a few times. and took out what looked like a fingerprint scanner.

"Alright. You understand that by agreeing to this you will give up your human rights, and you will become part of and thus be owned by a boy as a human foot. Your body will be transformed and completely under control to move, twist and be used as the boy sees fit as a boy normally does with his foot. If you agree, please press your thumb on this pad until you hear a beep"

By hearing these words, doubt rushed through his mind. He thought about the few good things in his life he was about to miss, but also about the things a foot goes through, not to mention the smell. Then he thought about his current life, and the urge to escape it. He then decided.
141.title: A rushed choice
